zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊价格为2963.97，24小时内小幅下跌0.34%。从技术面来看，ETH/USD在2979.76的高点和2949.94的低点之间震荡整理，显示出市场缺乏明确的方向性。短期内，价格在20日简单移动平均线(SMA)2958.07附近波动，表明市场可能会继续维持震荡格局。

在技术指标方面，MACD目前为-11.21190，表明下行动能较强，但由于信号线数据缺失，无法全面评估趋势。RSI尚未提供，建议关注后续数据以判断超买或超卖状态。整体来看，市场情绪相对谨慎，投资者需保持警惕。

支撑位方面，2949.94是关键支撑，如果价格跌破此水平，可能会进一步测试2900美元关口。反之，2979.76则为重要阻力位，突破后有望进一步上行至3000美元。投资者应密切关注这些价位。

建议交易者在当前市场条件下采取观望策略，避免盲目追单。若价格有效突破阻力位，可以考虑适量进场；若跌破支撑位，则应谨慎处理，及时止损以保护资金安全。保持灵活应变的策略，将有助于应对市场的波动。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current market price of Ethereum against the US Dollar stands at $2963.97, reflecting a slight decline of 0.34% over the past 24 hours. This minor downturn suggests a consolidation phase after recent volatility. Price action has established a range with notable resistance at $2979.76 and support around $2949.94. A sustained break above the resistance could indicate bullish momentum, while a dip below the support level may trigger further selling pressure.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of an RSI reading limits our ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions. However, the MACD is currently negative at -11.21190, which often signals bearish sentiment. Traders should monitor any potential divergence in the MACD for early signs of trend reversal. The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) at $2958.07 suggests that the price is hovering just above this critical level, acting as a potential support zone for buyers.

Given the current price action, traders should consider a cautious approach. If the price holds above the 20-day SMA and breaks through the resistance at $2979.76, it could present a buying opportunity with targets set around $3000. Conversely, if the price fails to maintain above $2949.94, a short position might be warranted, with targets towards lower support levels. Monitoring volume along with price movements will be crucial for validating any breakout or breakdown scenarios.

Ultimately, the ETH/USD market is at a critical juncture, and traders should remain vigilant. A clear break above or below established support and resistance levels could dictate the next significant move. As always, employing risk management strategies will be essential in navigating this volatile market landscape.
